name: Paragon (itch) (Meigan_Starr, BenPersonGameDev, stellerr, jonallen191, Santa4044)
description:
Step into an alternate reality where Earth has been invaded by the Bajita, a friendly alien race that has provided humanity with advanced technology. Experience what life is like through the eyes of Mika, a genius Bajita scientist working at Kasuri, as she researches digital reality. Explore beautiful digital environments, face challenging platforming obstacles, and get to know Mika's colorful co-workers!

Controls

  • WASD and Mouse - Move
  • Left Mouse Click - Interact with characters and items
  • W, A and Enter to select dialogue choices
    • Note: In case of getting stuck in choices, can pause the game with Esc select option and resume.
  • P - Pause
    • Note: Buttons on pause menu currently do not work
  • In digital reality
    • Ctrl - crouch
    • L-Shift - sprint
    • Space - jump
    • F - swap dimensions
    • See the tutorial in the level select for more info!
